item.description:
This sure is not kayaking but ----> it is an Indoor excersize event at a modest price..

And Free if you don't scate to just socialize with us.”

Hi Everyone,

This is simply a **HEATED** area for an indoor excersize night with the customary party dance music played to add to the evening' stimulation and if you don't care to scate (its free to enter). Ron-A-Roll NO KIDS NIGHT so you won't run them over ...

 

(As with all events,  bad winter road conditions will cancel this event..)

http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?site=box&FcstType=text&zmx=1&zmy=1&map.x=59&map.y=185&site=BOX


____________________________________
www.ronaroll.com 872-7094 CASH ONLY (No Debit or Credit Cards)


From Interstate 84 East: Take exit 66, left off the exit ramp, Ron-A-Roll is on the left.
Tuesday ADULT evening

Turn Back Time Tuesdays (Ages18 or older)  ""NO KIDS"" Tue, January 17, 7:30pm – 10:00pm

If Bringing your own skates -- Admission Only: $6.75

Admission With ~Rented~ Roller Skates: $10.25

-----------------------------------------------------

Getting There:
For GPS use.. 71 South Frontage Road, Vernon CT to get you close enough.. if your GPS needs another town use Rockville...its common to both towns.

From Interstate 84 East: Take exit 66, left off the exit ramp, Ron-A-Roll is on the left.

From Interstate 84 West: Take exit 66, right off the exit ramp, at the stop sign take a right, at the blinking light take a right and Ron-A-Roll is on the right.

From Route 83: Just into Rockville @ junction of Route 83 & 74 (7-11 on left, church & Mobil Gas across the street) Go straight through the stop light onto West Street, follow West Street for approximately 2 miles to the end, @ end turn right onto Route 30, take immediate left @ stop light onto Bolton Road, @ stop sign and blinking light take a right and Ron-A-Roll is on your right.

From Route 83: Just into Vernon @ junction of Route 83 & 30 - Vernon Walk in Clinic on right, Adams Supermarket & Fleet Bank across street. Take right onto Route 30, follow up the hill to 2nd stop light, take right @ Kentucky Fried FAKE Chicken, go onto 84 East, *follow directions from 84 East.

 

From Route 6 West: When Route 6 joins 44A, continue on Routes 6 & 44A toward Manchester, take a right @ 2nd stop light (Cider Mill across the street) onto Cider Mill Road, follow to end, then turn right onto Lake Street, follow Lake Street for approximately 3 miles then turn right onto Tunnel Road, after passing through the tunnel - continue up the hill and turn right at the blinking light, Ron-A-Roll is on the left side.

From Route 85 (Hebron): Cross Route 6 & 44A onto Cider Mill Road, *follow directions above for Route 6

From Interstate 91 South: Take exit for highway 291, follow to end, bear left onto 84 East, Take exit 66, left off ramp, Ron-A-Roll on left.

From Interstate 91 North: Take 84 East, take exit 66, left off the ramp, Ron-A-Roll on left.


See ya there if you are interested.
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Meet some of us by the bench near the black case with the Hartford County Rivers & Shore Kayakers Sign on it .

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: MAR- 6 -- Inline & Roller Skating ADULT NIGHT @ Ron -A- Roll
